--- title: Vartopia Constellation subtitle: Multi-Vendor Solution Reg short: solution tile: solution.png category: vendors ---

You can't manage and measure what you can't see. Vartopia built Constellation to give you the visibility you need to measure the results of your multi-vendor solutions in the channel.

Partner Registration Portal

Alliance Reporting Dashboard

Empower your Partners with a powerful suite of tools that allow them to Submit, Manage and Measure their Deal Registrations associated with your Multi-Vendor Solutions.

Features Include:

  • Partner Self Administration
    • Sales Groups / Territories
    • Users
  • Registration Submission Engine
    • Support for centralized registration processes
  • Registration Reporting Engine
    • Group & Filter on – Sales Rep, Customer, Expiration Date, Status, Program
    • Schedule Automated Report Delivery via email
  • Analytics Dashboard
    • Solution Registration Performance
    • At Risk Registrations

Give your Alliance teams with the visibility they need to track and measure the ROI on your Multi-Vendor solutions. Constellation provides Vendors with the ability to define solutions in Vartopia for deal registration by authorized channel partners.

When Multi-Vendor Solutions are registered through Vartopia, the individual deal registrations are routed to the appropriate Vendor Systems for review.  Updates to registrations are automatically pushed back the Partner´s System.

Participating Vendors have access to the combined deal registration data associated with these registrations. This allows your alliances organization to measure the results of your multi-vendor solutions being sold via the channel.
